Texts.Chs: 戴夫不坏！瘟疫作祟！ (死人的形象，以滑稽的方式描绘)
Texts.Eng: Dave doesn't mean to be evil! It's his virulent plague! (image of dead mantizi, drawn in comical fashion)

Texts.Chs: 戴夫化灰！麻风消失！(一张匆忙涂鸦的某种蠕虫的图片)
Texts.Eng: Dave is ashes! Leprous infection is gone! (a hastily scribbled image of some sort of worm)

Texts.Chs: 戴夫有病。他有麻风。别碰戴夫! (照片上是一个有病的胖子)
Texts.Eng: Dave is diseased. He is leprous. Don't Touch Dave! (picture of a diseased fat man)

Texts.Chs: 大家快跑！戴夫出笼！(照片上是一个血淋淋的笼子，上面有用来刺人的战略洞)
Texts.Eng: Everyone run away! Dave has escaped his stab-cage! (picture of a bloody cage with strategic holes for stabbing)

Texts.Chs: 戴夫万岁！(胖子鼓掌的画面)
Texts.Eng: Hurray for Dave! (image of fat man clapping)

Texts.Chs: 如碰戴夫，他会杀你，和你整家，缓慢痛苦！ (一架喷气式飞机和三只戴着帽子的火烈鸟的图片)
Texts.Eng: If you touch Dave, he'll kill you and your entire family in slow and agonizing ways! (picture of a jet, and three flamingo-like birds wearing hats)

Texts.Chs: 看看戴夫！又丑又臭！手指乱掉！ (同一个男人穿着无礼的紧身衣的照片)
Texts.Eng: Look at Dave! He's ugly and smelly! His fingers fall off at random! (picture of same man in an insultingly tight outfit)

Texts.Chs: 禁军长矛！杀死戴夫！烧死戴夫！(某人晚餐的照片)
Texts.Eng: The Praetorian has killed Dave with a spear! Let's burn Dave! (picture of someones dinner)
